text: Ezɨ Delaian ikɨzim, ko Tobian ikɨzim, ko Nekodan ikɨzim, men gumazibar dɨbobonim 652. Men nguibabar kara: Telmela, ko Telharsa, Kerup, Adan ko Imer. Gumazir kaba uari uan inazir afeziabar ziabagh fozir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn, me deravɨra uari akaghan kogh suam, me guizbangɨra Israelian adarasi, o puvatɨ.
